title: Add Instagram promo link for KK Euro Express videos

requirements.summary: Update the Home page VideoSection copy to promote Instagram and add an outbound Instagram profile link/button that opens in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: The VideoSection heading references Instagram videos in English (e.g., “Watch our videos on Instagram”).
The VideoSection includes a visible link/button that navigates to https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga.
The Instagram link opens in a new tab and uses rel="noopener noreferrer".
The existing video embed and fallback image behavior remain unchanged (video still attempts to load; fallback image still appears on error).

file_operations.description: Change the section heading/copy to “Watch our videos on Instagram” (English) and add a clear outbound link/button to https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Keep the existing <video> embed, onError handling, and fallback image behavior unchanged (including existing asset paths).

requirements.summary: Add a clearly labeled Instagram handle link to the site footer that opens in a new tab without altering existing contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays an Instagram link labeled in English and referencing @kkeuroexpress_banga.
Clicking the footer Instagram link opens https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga in a new tab with rel="noopener noreferrer".
No existing footer contact details (email/phone/24/7) are removed or changed.

file_operations.description: Add an Instagram link in the footer labeled in English (e.g., “Instagram: @kkeuroexpress_banga”) pointing to https://instagram.com/kkeuroexpress_banga with target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer". Ensure existing footer contact details (email/phone/24/7) remain unchanged.
